4.5 Implementing Data Preparation
In Chapter 6 we touch on data preparation an focus on how to transform time series data in
order to meet the expectations of a three-dimensional structure by some deep learning methods.
In Chapters 7, 8, and 9 we will explore how to implement deep learning methods for univariate,
